i_light_dark_rule.text_template: Verify that all light sources are disabled. Light is the enemy of the Dark Start.

i_light_on_6h_for_plants.text_template: **Lights ON.** Set your lights to **6 hours daily**. Your plants need energy to consume the ammonia. Without light, they will starve and rot, causing an ammonia spike.

i_light_basic_ramp_plan.text_template: Basic light: Start with **6 hours**. Increase duration by **30 minutes per week**. If algae appears, pause the ramp.

i_light_dedicated_ramp_plan.text_template: Dedicated light: Start at **6 hours** at **60%** intensity. Ramp intensity first (~10% per week), then increase duration. If algae appears, pause the ramp.

i_light_high_perf_ramp_low_demand.text_template: High-performance light (no high-demand plants): Start at **6 hours** at **30%** intensity. Ramp intensity first to **60%**, then increase duration. If algae appears, pause the ramp.

i_light_high_perf_ramp_high_demand.text_template: High-performance light (high-demand plants): Start at **6 hours** at **50%** intensity. Ramp intensity first to **100%**, then increase duration. If algae appears, pause the ramp.

t_light_basic_ramp_weekly.text_template: Basic light ramp: add 30 minutes to your photoperiod. If algae appears, pause the ramp.

t_light_dedicated_ramp_weekly.text_template: Dedicated light ramp: increase intensity by 10% per week first. After that, add 30 minutes of duration. Pause if algae appears.

t_light_high_perf_ramp_low_demand_weekly.text_template: High-performance ramp (no high-demand plants): increase intensity toward 60% first, then add 30 minutes of duration. Pause if algae appears.

t_light_high_perf_ramp_high_demand_weekl.text_template: High-performance ramp (high-demand plants): increase intensity toward 100% first, then add 30 minutes of duration. Pause if algae appears.

t_light_start_dedicated_60_6h.text_template: Start light at 60% intensity for 6 hours.

t_light_start_high_perf_low_30_6h.text_template: Start light at 30% intensity for 6 hours.

t_light_start_high_perf_high_50_6h.text_template: Start light at 50% intensity for 6 hours.
